item.title: 19+ tips to stop your emails from going to spam in 2025
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
Struggling with your emails landing in the spam folder? üìß Here are key tips to improve your email deliverability: - Build your own email list and use double opt-in methods. - Regularly clean your email list and monitor your sender reputation. - Ensure compliance with privacy laws and provide an email preference center. Stay informed and keep your messages in the inbox! üì® #EmailMarketing #SpamFilters #EmailTips #DigitalMarketing #InboxSuccess

item.title: A CDP is the Best Contextual Data Layer for Agentic Systems
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
AI agents thrive on accurate, real-time context. A Customer Data Platform (CDP) like Twilio Segment plays a crucial role in delivering this data. It provides clean, consented information tailored to the agents‚Äô needs. This enables more informed, efficient, and secure decision-making, ultimately enhancing customer experiences. #AI #CustomerExperience #DataManagement #Twilio #CDP
